text: Montevideo is an unincorporated community in Elbert and Hart counties, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== A post office called Montevideo was established in 1857, and remained in operation until 1903. The community's name is a transfer from Montevideo, in Uruguay. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Elbert County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Hart County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Montevideo, Georgia
